descriptionProfile: Photography, Paragliding, Adventure, Life - Venezuelan, half German based in Belgium and Peru - www.autana.org for travel, for pro photography visit
Photography, Paragliding, Adventure, Life - Venezuelan, half German based in Belgium and Peru - www.autana.org for travel, for pro photography visit

posts.description: Peru is possibly among the countries with strongest UV radiation in the world. In our last photoshoot for @o3sport wear in the desert, we realized how much it helps to use the right clothing.
A couple enjoying the peaceful morning at Paracas bay with @nixy_sports paddles. Where do you go when you want to find peace and a moment for yourself?

During the last photo workshop in the Peruvian desert we had a tiny world premiere for ourselves: The first paragliding flight into Cañón de los Perdidos made by my friend @alex.schweig. To get to the canyon, we had to cross several flash floods. One that was destroying the road from Ica to Nasca, and then the canyon had a waterfall and a river flowing in it. Can you find this canyon in the map?
If Mars had oceans, it would look like this. Do you know where this is?
The Maras Salt Ponds in Peru have been there since pre-Inca times. It amazes me what all these ancient cultures achieved during that time. Do you know how the salt is obtained here?

WORKSHOP ESPECIALIZADO EN FOTOGRAFÍA DE AVENTURA - Ven conmigo al desierto Peruano en un viaje de aprendizaje donde nos enfocaremos en Fotografía de Viajes y Aventura para mejorar tu nivel y sacar fotos espectaculares! Más info en mi BIO o escribe a info@autana.org
The sun slowly goes down behind Auyantepuy, but before it shines on the walls of Amaruay tepuy and the rain front, creating a beautiful rainbow. Do you know the name of this river?
posts.localization: Parque Nacional Canaima - Canaima National Park

posts.description:
You wake up, turn around, and the first thing you see are the Angel Falls. That is how you start the second day of the descent from the top. How it feels? Incredible to be disconnected from civilization, enjoying the views you get to see here each day of the trip we organise with @autanaventura deep in Venezuela´s lost world.
Te despiertas, te das la vuelta y lo primero que ves es el Salto Angel. Así es como comienzas el segundo día del descenso en rappel desde la parte superior. Como se siente? Increíble la sensación de estar desconectado de la civilización, disfrutando de las vistas que puedes tener cada día de este viaje que organizamos con @autanaaventura en lo profundo del mundo perdido de Venezuela.

You can sit the whole day at the beach of Canaima lagoon and not get bored. The sun changes, as well as the colours as the day passes. People come and go. This picture was taken during dry season. Water levels of el Carrao river drop, allowing the sandbanks to appear. The current is not so strong anymore, so you can even swim to the center and enjoy the view of the falls right in front of you.
